title: Create a Word Cloud from Customer Reviews
description: An analyst wants to create a word cloud from customer reviews to quickly visualize the most frequently mentioned terms.

tasks.description: Gather all customer review text from the last quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a single body of text containing all reviews.

tasks.description: Input the text into a word cloud generation tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the tool to process the text.
The tool produces a visual where more frequent words like 'easy', 'fast', and 'support' appear larger.
